name: vector2
description: Vector2 class packed with various utilities.

scripts.docs: typedoc --target ES6 --theme ./node_modules/typedoc-default-themes/bin/default --readme none --name "Vector2 Documentation" --mode file --out ./docs .; touch ./docs/.nojekyll;
scripts.all: yarn && typings install && npm run build && npm run test && npm run docs;
